how do i mount a usb hard drive from com: i have ubuntu server edition and i am trying to hook up an external usb hard disk
how do i find out what the device name is once i plug it in?
connect the drive, then do a 'sudo fdisk -l' to see if its filesystems are listed.  If you can see what it is, mount the filesystem with 'sudo mount /dev/<partition> /mnt/<mountpoint>
